II.iii.2.C.3.a
.
Distinguishing Claims for Increase From Requests for Decision Review
Under
38 CFR 3.2500(a)(2)
, claimants can request a review of a decision issued on a claim at any time after VA issues notice of a decision.  Therefore, screen all submissions regarding evaluation issues to determine the intent of the claimant.  The form used by the claimant will determine whether the submission should be handled as a
claim for increase, or
decision review request under
38 CFR 3.2500
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C - Claims for Increase
